welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kingston upon Thames, known for its charming riverside location and rich history. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy its unique blend of old-world charm and modern amenities. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the smaller of the two terminals, mainly serving European and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For the convenience of private jet and helicopter owners, Redhill Aerodrome offers a separate terminal with exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
